q1.title: What is the AI-Assisted Complaint Management System?
q1.content: It is a platform that allows customers to submit complaints, track their progress, and receive resolutions.

q2.title: Who can use this system?
q2.content: The system is designed for customers, complaint handlers, administrators, and general managers. Customers submit complaints, while staff members manage and resolve them.

q1.title: How do I register for an account?
q1.content: Click 'Register,' fill in your details, verify your phone number via OTP, and log in.

q2.title: What if I forget my password?
q2.content: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your phone number or email, and follow the reset instructions.

q3.title: Can I update my profile details?
q3.content: Yes, you can change your contact details in the 'Profile Settings'.

q1.title: How do I submit a complaint?
q1.content: Log in, click 'Submit Complaint,' choose an issue that you have faced, and submit.

q2.title: How can I track my complaint status?
q2.content: Navigate to 'Track Complaint Status, and view real-time updates.

q3.title: What if my complaint is not resolved?
q3.content: If unresolved within a set timeframe, it will be escalated to a complaint handler or a general manager.

q1.title: How does the AI system assist with complaints?
q1.content: The AI categorizes complaints,  and escalates complex cases to human handlers.

q1.title: I canâ€™t log in. What should I do?
q1.content: Ensure your credentials are correct, reset your password if needed, clear your browser cache, or contact support.

q2.title: The system is not accepting my complaint. What should I do?
q2.content: Check that all required fields are filled correctly and that your internet connection is stable. If the issue persists, report it via 'Help & Support'.

q1.title: How can I contact support?
q1.content: You can reach support via email (support@eeucomplaints.com), phone (+251-999-888-777), or live chat within the system.

ai.title: AI-Powered Categorization
ai.description: Smart complaint classification for faster resolutions.

realtime.title: Real-Time Tracking
realtime.description: Customers can monitor complaint progress instantly.

automation.title: Automated Responses
automation.description: Instant solutions for common electricity issues.
